eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian

Class SVB

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian.SVB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm, ParameterLearningAlgorithm, java.io.Serializable

    public class SVB
extends java.lang.Object
implements BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm, java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm interface. It defines the Streaming Variational Bayes (SVB) algorithm.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#svbexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
